content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command from you to browse a Michigan State University Extension website to download a PDF guide titled "Identifying Trees of Michigan". However, it could not be executed due to a host resolution error. You then requested a Google search for "identifying trees of Michigan pdf" and found several resources including a revised 2022 edition of the guide from Michigan State University Extension, a PDF on tree identification basics in Michigan, and a guide to Michigan\'s species from the Michigan Department of Natural Resources. You then issued a command to browse the website and download the PDF guide. The command returned an answer stating that the PDF can be downloaded by clicking on the "DOWNLOAD FILE" button located at the top of the article. Finally, you executed a shell command to download the PDF guide.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'--2023-05-18 21:08:55--  https://www.canr.msu.edu/sites/default/files/documents/2022-05/E2332-Identifying-Trees-Michigan-2022-05.pdf\\nResolving www.canr.msu.edu (www.canr.msu.edu)... 23.21.228.181, 52.201.9.151, 52.72.128.165\\nConnecting to www.canr.msu.edu (www.canr.msu.edu)|23.21.228.181|:443... connected.\\nHTTP request sent, awaiting response... 404 \\n2023-05-18 21:08:55 ERROR 404: (no description).\\n\\n'"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "identifying trees of michigan pdf"}}}'}]
